claim.text: Artificial intelligence (AI) can be used to develop more accurate climate models.
claim.exact_quote: AI has the potential to revolutionize climate modeling by enabling the development of more accurate and comprehensive models.

evidence.evidence_text: AI has the potential to improve the accuracy of climate models by enabling the development of more complex and sophisticated models that can better capture the complex interactions between the atmosphere, oceans, and land surface.
evidence.exact_quote: AI has the potential to improve the accuracy of climate models by enabling the development of more complex and sophisticated models that can better capture the complex interactions between the atmosphere, oceans, and land surface.

evidence.evidence_text: A recent study found that AI-powered climate models were able to produce more accurate predictions of future climate conditions than traditional climate models.
evidence.limitations: The study was conducted using a limited number of climate models.
evidence.exact_quote: A recent study found that AI-powered climate models were able to produce more accurate predictions of future climate conditions than traditional climate models.
